event.title: was formerly incorporated as a village prior to 1979

data.event: It was formerly incorporated as a village prior to 1979 when it amalgamated with four other municipalities to form Crowsnest Pass.
Bellevue was founded in 1905 on the flat land above the Bellevue Mine operated by the French-based West Canadian Collieries (WCC).

event.title: 1909 the Maple Leaf Coal Company commenced

data.event: In 1909 the Maple Leaf Coal Company commenced operations at the Mohawk Bituminous Mine and constructed the settlement of Maple Leaf adjacent to Bellevue.
In 1913 WCC transferred many workers to Bellevue from its closed Lille operations.

event.title: displayed a five-ton coal boulder at the 1910

data.event: WCC displayed a five-ton coal boulder at the 1910 Dominion Exhibition in Calgary.
